name: wonder-skin

effect.black_white: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.black_2_white_2: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

flavor_text.black_white: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
